name: Halloween Game jam project
description:
had only 4 days to make this game for game jam with my code partner Sami,

Link to his iotch: https://itch.io/profile/unrealalien

This is just fps-shooter game, where you have to collect to 14 pumpkin for winning the game. Had no time to add restat button, so you have to close manually game to restart it.

Movement = WASD
Shooting = mouse1
Jump =space
